title: Medical Acupuncture
author: Featured Content About This Publication Editorial Board Reprints; Permissions News Releases Sample Issue
description: Delivering authoritative, evidence-based translational research on integrating acupuncture with allopathic medicine.
cleaned_text: Announcements - Earn AMA PRA Category 1 Credits Medical Acupuncture has been granting 1 AMA PRA Category 1 Credits for selected articles in the Journal in collaboration with the American Academy of Medical Acupuncture. The CME credit is free for AAMA members but available to other subscribers and readers at a cost of $30. [Find a selection of these articles here.](https://home.liebertpub.com/spcoll/recently-published-cme-articles/91/) - RFS Awards in Science Winner Mary Ann Liebert, Inc., in partnership with the Rosalind Franklin Society launched a prestigious annual award to recognize outstanding published peer-reviewed research by women and underrepresented minorities in science in each of the publisher's peer-reviewed journals. The RFS Awards in Science for Medical Acupuncture has selected Stephanie I. Cheng, MD, DABMA, FAAMA who co-authored [Intraoperative Acupuncture as Part of a Multimodal Analgesic Regimen to Reduce Opioid Usage After Total Knee Arthroplasty: A Prospective Cohort Trial](https://www.liebertpub.com/doi/10.1089/acu.2021.0072). - CALL FOR PAPERS Featured Content Society Affiliations The
